theme.title: Two 16th notes, one quarter note and two 16th notes
theme.para: In this lesson a new rhythmic pattern is introduced as the result of tying a group of two 8th notes and a quarter note to a group of a quarter note and two 8th notes. Note how it can also be written with a quarter note:

score.music: (Metrica 2 4 NoVisible)(n * s g+)(n * s)(n * c l g-)(n * c g+)(n * s)(n * s g-)) (c (n * s g+)(n * s g-)(n * n)(n * s g+)(n * s g-)(Barra Final))

part.title: Lesson and note the differences
part.para: Note the difference between the first and the second measure. Note how it is formed when putting a tie.

score.music: (Metrica 2 4)(n * s g+)(n * s)(n * c g-)(n * c g+)(n * s)(n * s g-)) (c (n * s g+)(n * s)(n * c l g-)(n * c g+)(n * s)(n * s g-)) (c (n * s g+)(n * s g-)(n * n)(n * s g+)(n * s g-)(Barra Final))

part.title: Exercises
part.para: Exercise 1 - Train your ear and practise the introduced rhythmic patterns.
Exercise 2 - Read scores containing the rhythms studied in this lesson.
